author: prestonvanloon
content: Since we renamed DepositReceipt to DepositRequest, should we rename ExecutionLayerConsolidationRequest and ExecutionLayerWithdrawalRequest to drop the EL prefix? Or should we add the prefix to DepositRequest?

author: prestonvanloon
content: i.e. ExecutionLayerWithdrawalRequest -> WithdrawalRequest and ExecutionLayerConsolidationRequest -> ConsolidationRequest

author: m.kalinin
content: Good call, I personally in favour of shorter names, especially in this case as shortening doesn't seem to affect the semantics, we just drop the explicit mentioning of the EL as a source of the request
